ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes we do, and our limit is 75 as well. Took me a while to figure that one out ... I was getting really frustrated as my skill didn t go up after that level!!!
ygData.messageBody:
Yes we do, and our limit is 75 as well. Took me a while to figure that one
out ... I was getting really frustrated as my skill didn't go up after that
level!!! If you are asking whether to work on archery, however, I would
highly reccomend it. It takes a year and a day to get up, but it is very
worth it, especially when you are older and can afford a nice bow. I can't
wait for a darkwood.

> Do we have a maximum skill limit like the Palidans do in the catagory (I
> think theirs is 75)?

later,
Jeremy
player of Virten, Shadowknight of Neriak, 23rd circle of hate
